metadata.synopsis: When trying to talk to Nightsong, exclaims that it is better to leave it to the avatar who is controlling Shadowheart.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Set the shadowheart act 2 epilogue nightsong camp night through origin debug book2. Start camp night3. Talk to Nightsong with avatar that isn't controlling Shadowheart

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Where's Shadowheart? I think she'll want a word.
